title: A big bug on the runes!
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R3R2OdN497E&feature=youtu.be
let view the video ,when i edit or select it on the games ,it will happen!

replies.body: Looks like that weird rune page issue has gotten to you as well. We're still working on a hard fix for it, but hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can get that sorted out in a jiffy!
thank youÔºÅI was reply serval time in other post~sorry~
